snippet: Michael Isikoff, whose work included coverage of the government’s war on terror and other national issues, said his departure was amicable.
abstract: Media Decoder blog; Michael Isikoff, investigate reporter who has broken numerous national news stories, leaves NBC News, saying his departure is amicable; his work included coverage of government’s war on terror.
lead_paragraph: Michael Isikoff, whose work included coverage of the government’s war on terror and other national issues, said his departure was amicable.
